EmailTemplate.description: For License/Permit sent out by 'Send License' button or by dashboard link
EmailTemplate.name: Registration Approval & License Notice NINTEX
EmailTemplate.subject: {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c} Approval & {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Division of Labor Standards Enforcement has completed the application review for {!License_Registration__c.RegistrationTypeLabelForConga__c} {!License_Registration__c.Permit_Type_Mask__c} for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}, {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}.
Attached is the {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c} {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} document or verification document.
Sincerely,
Licensing & Registration Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California
